svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:141.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/141.0" version="28.0.6"> <diagram name="Error Handling Flow" id="1EVNSTkbx_gsY3mKlkg2"> <mxGraphModel dx="784" dy="1138" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-1" value="Service Layer" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="40" width="180" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-2" value="Throws Exception
(NotFound / Conflict / BadRequest)" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="110" width="220" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-3" value="@ControllerAdvice
GlobalExceptionHandler" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="200" width="220" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-4" value="ErrorResponse
{ error: "..." }" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="290" width="220" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-5" value="HTTP Response to Client" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="380" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-6" style="endArrow=block;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-1" target="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-7" style="endArrow=block;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-2" target="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-3"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-8" style="endArrow=block;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-3" target="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-9" style="endArrow=block;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-4" target="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-10" value="MethodArgumentNotValidException" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="110" width="240" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-11" value="Mapped by
ValidationErrorExtractor" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="190" width="240" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-12" value="Validation Error Payload
{ errors: [ ... ] }" style="rounded=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="270" width="240" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-13" style="endArrow=block;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-10" target="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-14" style="endArrow=block;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-11" target="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-15" style="endArrow=block;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-12" target="5kk7rjDKeTuyI7CP4m3s-5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
